Walk The Times is a dynamic adventure RPG with Rogue-Lite mechanics.

Players take on the role of an explorer who has just arrived on an island set in the year -6000. Using temporal artifacts, players will embark on adventures across various dimensions to return to the year 0 and uncover what happened.

During their journey, players will explore multiple dimensions that occur in small areas where a random situation unfolds. The exploration is dynamic, offering players a real sense of adventure. Numerous chests and activities in different dimensions provide players with weapons, spells, or runes. Combat is a significant part of "Walk The Times," requiring players to face tough enemies in numerous dynamic battles.

The RPG aspect of the game comes with a unique twist. The character possesses three attributes: Strength, Agility, and Intelligence. The player's main attribute defines their archetype and drastically alters their exploration and combat styles. These "classes" are determined at the start of an adventure when choosing their armor (helmet, breastplate, leg armor).

For example, a player with STRENGTH will explore aggressively and use destructive skills. In contrast, a player with INTELLIGENCE will use temporal magic for exploration and combat.

If players reach the end of a journey or die tragically, they return to a nomadic village in -6000. This village, the heart of the game, features an altar that can be upgraded with temporal resources found during adventures. The village includes various buildings, such as a forge, a hunting altar to enhance adventures, or a well of memory with challenges of all sorts.

The story of "Walk The Times" changes with each adventure. You will meet different nomadic tribes, heroes who have ventured like you, or create your own story alone. However, each story has a common denominator that will help players understand the game's narrative and the reasons behind this temporal chaos.

Discover much more, with vehicles, unique characters, legendary quests, and hidden character archetypes.

content_descriptors.notes: Fights without gore or blood; display of weapons; bones/skeletons

short_description: Walk the Times is a 3D roguelite RPG that will transport you to an island lost to the currents of fate. Your mission is to rescue the fate of your timeline from the brink of collapse. Will you beat the clock and emerge triumphant, or succumb to the relentless passage of time?
